about_the_game:
Shepherd Knight is a game that places you in the role of a fearless shepherdess, a member of a noble order of shepherd knights. With your faithful dog by your side, your mission is to herd, guide, and protect your sheep while facing numerous challenges.

GAMEPLAY

Herd
A unique and difficult profession was required, where it was needed to have combat skills and at the same time take care of docile and adorable creatures.

Shepherd
A brave shepherdess with a challenge on her hands, where she needs to protect and guide her sheep on a pilgrimage journey facing obstacles and challenges.

Dog companion
With your faithful friend by your side, everything becomes easier. With a fundamental role in keeping the flock together and at the same time keeping threats away from the flock.

The Sheep
Sheep are not very intelligent creatures and cannot protect themselves, but they are very adorable, making their company more relaxing.

Dangers
Keep your sheep protected from danger while feeding and guiding them through this hostile world filled with creatures trying to devour them.

EXPLORE AND ADVENTURE YOURSELF
Adventure yourself into a beautiful and mysterious world, with your flock and your faithful companion, solving puzzles and facing enemies along the way.

Puzzles
Solve puzzles to unlock and discover new areas.

Collectibles
Have fun exploring this world while collecting various items along the way.
